attributes.action: Help the residents of Duddeston Manor Road/Nechells with the ongoing car crime
attributes.additional_details:
Average of 1-2 cars daily affected by car crime 
Rise of car crime on Duddeston Manor Road alone has gotten worse. 
Schools have been affected
People's work has been affected 
Unfair personal costs 
Psychological, physical and emotional effects it has on people's lives, including our children. 
Effects car crime has on insurance for the area.
Public safety concerns 
Health and safety concerns due to the materials that are left behind I.e , glass  oil etc.
Living in fear due to apprehension
attributes.background:
CCTV or equivalent 
Speed humps 
Neighbourhood Watch
Support with insurance claims
Quicker response from police 
Increase patrol cars in the area
Victim support 
Clamp Down on car part theft including garages. 
Work alongside the residence to implement improvements and suggestions.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local law enforcement and traffic interventions are a matter for your local police force and local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also raise your issue with your local Police and Crime Commissioner: https://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
